title: Elon Musk: Apple is a ‘Tesla graveyard’ that only hires the engineers he fires
text:
Elon Musk: Apple is a ‘Tesla graveyard’ that only hires the engineers he fires 
Published By: BGR.com - Today 
Say what you will about Tesla CEO Elon Musk, the man is not one to pull any punches. During a recent interview with the German business news...
